name: Kiri Boutique Hotel

reviews.text: My family of 8 stayed in this hotel for two nights, the rooms are a reasonable size two rooms had small problems with the air conditioner and all remarked that the shower water catchment area included the toilet and did not drain very good resulting in wet feet whenever visiting the toilet. The food in their restaruant was very nice both for lunch and breakfast but took an hour after ordering to be served.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.text: The owner is very helpfull and willing to help with tours etc.
reviews.title: relaxing and comfortable stay at boutique hotel

reviews.text: Kiri Boutique hotel in Siem Reap has been a welcoming stay for five nights. We stayed in a quiet, spacious room (the Villa) together with our 2 year old son. Very helpful staff who sometimes still have to find their way (how to make a Bloody Mary?), but at your service immediately and of good spirit. Breakfast is nice and the restaurant serves some good and authentic Cambodian dishes for diner. The pool is small, clean and refreshing after visiting the temples of Ankor Wat. I do recommend the hotel for a comfortable visit to Siem Reap.
reviews.title: Very friendly, helpful and comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our family of six adults and two teenagers stayed here for 3 nights from 31 Dec and had a lovely stay. We were made to feel very welcome and nothing we wanted was any trouble. The massge and breakfast were great. I thoroughly recommend this hotel!
reviews.title: Very friendly

description: The hotel is located just off of Angkor High School Road directly opposite from Cambodian Mekong University. Only 1km away from town. Guests will find such attractions as the Old Market; the Pub Street area with a wide variety of dining and shopping options. Hotel offers special promotion:- Free airport pick up - Free Khmer traditional massage 60mins per each guest - Free bike ride to town - Free bike ride from hotel to Ankor complex or town. Minimum a 3-night stay if the guests book directly with hotel.
